data_description.Description: results from the classifier for the sleep session

num_scan.Description: number of the fMRI scans of the sleep session

state.Description: state that is the most represented for each scan

face.Description: probability that the scan correspond to the FACE game

maze.Description: probability that the scan correspond to the MAZE game

prep_face.Description: probability that the scan correspond to the preparation phase before the FACE game

pre_maze.Description: probability that the scan correspond to the preparation phase before the MAZE game

rest.Description: probability that the scan correspond to the REST period
